title: Building a Research Agent That Actually Scales
excerpt: Building an extensible research and analytics agent using Strands Agents, Bedrock, and Perplexity. From YAML-based requirements to processing 200 targets in parallel, and all the lessons learned along the way.

title: DevEx Chronicles: Building Arch Linux on ARM from Scratch
excerpt: What started as a weekend project to install Linux on an unsupported laptop turned into a month-long deep dive into Arch Linux ARM, custom desktop environments, and learning how modern Linux actually works.

title: Bringing Bedrock's Model Choice to Minimalist Engineers
excerpt: A quick story on integrating Bedrock with the Zed IDE and all the ways Rust made it amazing and a little painful. Six months of work to bring 39 serverless models to Zed.

title: Welcome to My Blog
excerpt: This is where I write about things I'm working through, building, or just thinking about. Learning in public, or just being honest about the process.
